thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Pam Vaughan

author: Pam Vaughan
title: Pam Vaughan
text:
I love my new hoselink hose and reel.
I've been putting up with hoses that tangle and burst off the tap for years.
My family will tell you that this is one of my pet hates, trying to water the
plants or hose the carport while the hose keeps bursting off the tap grrr.
Since I bought my hoselink hose and reel I haven't had that problem.
No leaks and it's so easy to roll up when I've finished using it.
I would highly recommend this product.
